comments.body: nit: I tend to use %q instead of %s since it helps in cases of empty string and whitespace characters
@vmarmol ack; I'm going to make a follow up PR to factor out this code since at this point we have three different tests that can all use it; will address then.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +132,136 @@		By(fmt.Sprintf("pod logs:%v\n", string(logs)))
		if strings.Contains(string(logs), "Internal Error") {
			By(fmt.Sprintf("Failed to get logs from host %s pod %s container %s: %v",
				podStatus.Status.Host, podStatus.Name, podStatus.Spec.Containers[0].Name, string(logs)))
			time.Sleep(5 * time.Second)
